title: So where’s the money?
text:
I regularly send money to a friend in Europe.  I transfer dollars to my Revolut account and exchange them for Euros and then send.  Everything is quite fast but the process of moving the money from my bank to Revolut is very slow.  For example, this month I requested a transfer on the 1st of the month. Today is the 7th and the money has not yet arrived.   Last month there was a similar delay.  

With other services, such as Wise, the entire process of moving the money from my account to my friend’s takes only two to three days.  

I find it hard to believe this is the best Revolut can do.

title: Love this app
text: Hands down best app I’ve ever downloaded!

title: Received payment in minutes
text: Fantastic way to tranfer money. I can’t believe it could be this fast.

title: Customer Service
text: I like Revolut a lot, but their customer service is probably one of the worst ones I’ve ever encountered. I have been waiting for the response, in the Live Chat, for the past 45 minutes… really hope they can fix that.

title: Extraordinary Banking
text: All around perfect experience, easy to navigate platform, user friendly, clear interface and complete banking and investing experience! Keep it up!

title: Don’t know why everyone is having all these problems.
text: I’ve been using Revolut for two years now, and it has been solid so far never have my money held hostage and never had any problems transferring money. I’ve gotten three referral bonuses of $100 and one of $110 and the money goes on immediately can’t complain about free money five star review.!
